ad-hoc.query: -- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.outE('CALLS') -- META-END select tail.indexKey, head.indexKey, head.declLabel from gremlin
-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.outE('USES') -- META-END select tail.parentClass "Class", tail.nodeName "Method", head.indexKey "Field__|" from gremlin
-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.outE('CALLS').inV.filter{it.parentClass.matches(/java.lang..*/)} -- META-END select indexKey from gremlin

-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.outE('CALLS') -- .outV.filter{!it.parentClass.matches(/.*.reflect..*/)}.back(2) -- .inV.filter{it.parentClass.matches(/java.lang.reflect..*/)}.back(2) -- META-END select tail.classLabel "Class", tail.declLabel "Caller", tail.icon "Caller__(icon)", head.declLabel "Callee__|", head.icon "Callee__(icon)", head.classLabel "Callee_Class" from gremlin

query.description: How does source code call that method? (trace)

ad-hoc.query: -- META-BEGIN(?gremlin?) -- g.V("indexKey", "?MethodKey?") -- .as('x').in('CALLS') -- .filter{!it.parentClass.matches(/java.lang.reflect..*/)} -- .loop('x') -- {it.loops < 10 && -- it.object.called -- }.path -- .enablePath -- META-END select id "Path", classLabel "Class__|", declLabel from gremlin
-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V[?Id?] -- META-END select indexKey, declLabel from gremlin

-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.as('x').out('CALLS').loop('x') -- {!it.path.contains(it) && !it.object.parentClass.matches(/java.util..*/)}.path -- .enablePath -- META-END select id "Path", classLabel "Class__|", declLabel from gremlin

-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.filter{it.parentClass.matches(/java.lang.reflect..*/)} -- .as('x').in('CALLS') -- .filter{!it.parentClass.matches(/java.lang.reflect..*/)} -- .loop('x') -- {it.loops < 5 && -- it.object.called -- }.path -- .enablePath -- META-END select id "Path", classLabel "Class__|", declLabel from gremlin

query.description: What methods are called the least from the source?

ad-hoc.query: -- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.filter{!it.fromSource} -- .in('CALLS').filter{it.fromSource}.back(2) -- .order{it.a.numCalled - it.b.numCalled} -- META-END select classLabel "Class", declLabel "Method__|", icon "Method__(icon)", numCalled "#Times_called", indexKey "MethodKey__(hide)", id "MethodId__(hide)" from gremlin

query.description: What methods are called the least?

ad-hoc.query: -- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.in('CALLS').back(1) -- .order{it.a.numCalled - it.b.numCalled} -- META-END select classLabel "Class", declLabel "Method__|", icon "Method__(icon)", indexKey "MethodKey__(hide)", id "MethodId__(hide)" from gremlin

-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.filter{it.parentClass.matches(/java.lang.Class/) && it.declLabel.matches(/newInstance()/)} -- .in('CALLS') -- META-END select classLabel "Class", declLabel "Method__|", icon "Method__(icon)", indexKey "MethodKey__(hide)", id "MethodId__(hide)" from gremlin

-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.filter{it.interesting != null && it.interesting.length() > 0} -- META-END select classLabel "Class", declLabel "Method__|", icon "Method__(icon)", interesting "First_string_found", indexKey "MethodKey__(hide)", id "MethodId__(hide)" from gremlin

-- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.filter{it.invokeDynamic} -- META-END select classLabel "Class", declLabel "Method__|", icon "Method__(icon)", indexKey "MethodKey__(hide)", id "MethodId__(hide)" from gremlin

query.description: What reflection APIs are used in the program?

ad-hoc.query: -- META-BEGIN(gremlin) -- g.V.filter{it.parentClass.matches(/.*.reflect..*/)} -- .in('CALLS').filter{!it.parentClass.matches(/.*.reflect..*/)}.back(2) -- META-END select classLabel "Class", declLabel "Method__|", icon "Method__(icon)", indexKey "MethodKey__(hide)", id "MethodId__(hide)" from gremlin
